entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands early this morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
